WHERE MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%'
WHERE BOARD_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{val} || '%'

ORDER BY board_id desc )a )b WHERE b.rn > (#{page} - 1) *10
AND b.rn <= #{page} * 10
